title: MDM Operations Engineer, Retail Engineering
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work...
description: The Retail Device Management team is looking for an excellent MDM Operations Engineer to help support and secure our rapidly growing MDM platform and ensure it is manageable, scalable, and reliable...
key_qualifications: Expertise in both macOS and iOS operating systems; Detailed experience with scripting; Python and shell strongly preferred; Experience with MDM and MDM protocols, focusing on macOS and iOS...
preferred_qualifications: In-depth JAMF Pro experience with large scale deployments for macOS and iOS strongly preferred; JAMF Pro certification a strong plus; Familiarity with continuous delivery systems and GIT...
